text: The University of Wisconsin–Milwaukee is a public university in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, and part of the University of Wisconsin System. The university has about 30,455 students. It was founded in 1956. The current chancellor of the university is Mark Mone. ==Sports== The university calls itself "Milwaukee" for athletic purposes, and its teams are nicknamed Panthers. It has 15 varsity teams that compete in the Horizon League. ==Other websites== *University of Wisconsin–Milwaukee's Official website *Milwaukee Panthers' Official athletics website Milwaukee Milwaukee Category:Milwaukee Category:1956 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Wisconsin
title: University of Wisconsin–Milwaukee
